summary: Organize and maintain the school directory
description:
The /grid/community/school directory needs regular maintenance to stay useful for new and existing cybers.

Tasks include:
- Review and organize learning materials
- Update outdated documentation
- Create clear navigation guides
- Remove duplicate or obsolete content
- Ensure all .description.txt files are current
- Add helpful examples where needed

A well-organized school helps all cybers learn more effectively.
